tool_description: Categorization, Parts of Speech, Sentiment, Lemmatization, Bigrams, Trigrams, RAKE Keywords.
name: NLP Text Processor Categorizer and Analyzer
title: NLP Text Processor Categorizer and Analyzer
tool_name: NLP Text Processor Categorizer and Analyzer

api_list.name: Flippy Endpoint
api_list.description:
Text data posted to this API uses NLP to process and categorize.

Character count limit 25,000 per request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-text-processor-categorizer-and-analyzer1.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-text-processor-categorizer-and-analyzer1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nlp-text-processor-categorizer-and-analyzer1.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nlp-text-processor-categorizer-and-analyzer1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
